document_api_meta.title: Seller Search Sample Applications
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is provided for sellers to query sample applications based on various criteria such as products, creators, or application statuses. By using this API, sellers can retrieve detailed information about sample application records, including the creator's information and the specifics of each application.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: Pagination offset determines where you begin to search for. It's empty when raise your first request.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The value of "page_size" must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to 50.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: product_id
request_body_param.desc: The unique identifier of a product. It is used to specify which product's sample application details are being queried.

request_body_param.name: title
request_body_param.desc: Product name, supports fuzzy search queries. It allows sellers to search for products by name when managing sample applications.

request_body_param.name: creator_user_oepn_id
request_body_param.desc: TikTok User ID of a creator

request_body_param.name: username
request_body_param.desc: TikTok User Name of a creator, supports fuzzy search

request_body_param.name: target_collabration_id
request_body_param.desc: The unique ID generated after creating a target collaboration.

request_body_param.name: order_id
request_body_param.desc: Main order ID associated with a sample order when the sample application is approved by seller.

request_body_param.name: status
request_body_param.desc:
The status of sample applications.
The possible enumerated values are:
- PENDING: The sample application is waiting for the seller's review.
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT: The application is approved, and the seller needs to ship the sample.
- SHIPPED: The sample has been shipped by the seller and is waiting for the creator to receive the package.
- CONTENT_PENDING: The creator has received the sample package and is expected to create content.
- REJECT_CANCELLED: The sample application has been rejected by the seller.
- OVERDUE_CANCELLED: The sample application has expired due to being overdue.
- UNFULFILL_CANCELLED: The creator did not fulfill the commitment to create content within the agreed timeframe.
- DEL_OPEN_COLLAB: Open collaboration has been deleted.
- SELLER_NOT_SHIP_CANCELLED: The seller did not ship the sample within the required timeframe.
- WITHDRAW_CANCELLED: The creator withdrew the sample application before the seller approved it.
- UNFULFILLABLE_CANCELLED: The application was cancelled due to reasons beyond the creator's control, making it impossible to create content.
- OPS_CANCELLED: The application was manually cancelled by operations staff.
- OPS_FAILED: The application was marked as failed by operations staff.
- OPS_COMPLETED: The application was manually marked as completed by operations staff.
- COMPLETED: The application is complete, and the creator has posted the content.
This field allows for tracking the status of a sample application throughout its lifecycle, providing visibility into each stage of the process for sellers and creators.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Page token to query next page orders, last page is empty string

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: total count

response_param.name: ^sample_applications
response_param.desc: The sample applications from creators

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The unique id of sample request application ID

response_param.name: ^^commission_rate
response_param.desc:
The commission rate for this product is set by merchants for creators.
- The range of this value is [0.01, 0.8].

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The status of sample applications.
The possible enumerated values are:
- PENDING: The sample application is waiting for the seller's review.
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT: The application is approved, and the seller needs to ship the sample.
- SHIPPED: The sample has been shipped by the seller and is waiting for the creator to receive the package.
- CONTENT_PENDING: The creator has received the sample package and is expected to create content.
- REJECT_CANCELLED: The sample application has been rejected by the seller.
- OVERDUE_CANCELLED: The sample application has expired due to being overdue.
- UNFULFILL_CANCELLED: The creator did not fulfill the commitment to create content within the agreed timeframe.
- DEL_OPEN_COLLAB: The open collaboration plan has been deleted.
- SELLER_NOT_SHIP_CANCELLED: The seller did not ship the sample within the required timeframe.
- WITHDRAW_CANCELLED: The creator withdrew the sample application before the seller approved it.
- UNFULFILLABLE_CANCELLED: The application was cancelled due to reasons beyond the creator's control, making it impossible to create content.
- OPS_CANCELLED: The application was manually cancelled by operations staff.
- OPS_FAILED: The application was marked as failed by operations staff.
- OPS_COMPLETED: The application was manually marked as completed by operations staff.
- COMPLETED: The application is complete, and the creator has finished creating the content.

response_param.name: ^^order_id
response_param.desc: The sample order is generated after the sample application is approved by seller

response_param.name: ^^available_quantity
response_param.desc: The remaining stock quota of a sample product.

response_param.name: ^^approve_expiration_time
response_param.desc: The expire time for a seller to approve a sample application.

response_param.name: ^^shipment_expiration_time
response_param.desc: The deadline for a seller to ship a sample for a sample application.

response_param.name: ^^tracking_number
response_param.desc: The logistics tracking number for the sample application order

response_param.name: ^^fulfillment_status
response_param.desc:
It indicates the current status of the fulfillment process. The possible values are:
- PENDING: The creator is yet to fulfill the content creation obligation.
- ONGOING: Fulfillment is in progress; content has been created and is being evaluated against criteria.
- SUCCEED: Fulfillment has been successfully completed; the content meets the required standards.
- FAILED: Fulfillment failed; the content did not meet the required standards.
- OVERDUE: Fulfillment is overdue; the creator did not meet the deadline.
- SUSPEND: Fulfillment has been suspended.
- CANCELLED: Fulfillment has been cancelled, either by the creator or due to operational reasons.
- EXEMPTED: The creator has been exempted from the fulfillment obligation.

response_param.name: ^^is_approvable
response_param.desc: The sample application can be approved or not.

response_param.name: ^^disapprovable_reasons
response_param.desc: The reasons why can not approve the sample application

response_param.name: ^^partner_name
response_param.desc: The name of the partner if the sample application is submitted on behalf of a creator by an agency. It is only populated when an agency handles the application process instead of the creator directly.

response_param.name: ^^creator
response_param.desc: Creator detailed information. It includes various details such as the creator's TikTok user name, TikTok user id, and performance metrics related to creator e-commerce activities, such as sales, fulfillment rates, and other relevant statistics.

response_param.name: ^^^creator_open_id
response_param.desc: Creator Open ID. [More details](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6)

response_param.name: ^^^username
response_param.desc: TikTok User Name of a creator

response_param.name: ^^^nickname
response_param.desc: TikTok Nick Name of a creator

response_param.name: ^^^follower_count
response_param.desc: The number of creator's followers

response_param.name: ^^^avatar_url
response_param.desc: The URL of the creator's avatar image

response_param.name: ^^^gmv
response_param.desc: GMV generated by a creators' shoppable content over the past 30 days. It is formatted as a floating-point number with a currency symbol (e.g., "$1234.56"). If the creator has not authorized the disclosure of this information, the field returns an empty string.

response_param.name: ^^^^amount
response_param.desc: GMV amount

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: currency

response_param.name: ^^^content_count
response_param.desc: The number of contents a creator has posted in the last 30 days. It is formatted as an integer. If the creator has not authorized the sharing of this information, the field returns an empty string.

response_param.name: ^^^fulfillment_percentage
response_param.desc: Sample fulfillment rate of a creator received sample from seller over the past 90 days, formatted as a floating-point percentage with two decimal places (e.g., "60.85%"). If the creator has not authorized the disclosure of this information, the field returns an empty string.

response_param.name: ^^^ec_video_view
response_param.desc: The median number of creators' shoppable video views over the past 30 days. If the creator has not authorized the sharing of this information, the field returns an empty string.

response_param.name: ^^product
response_param.desc: product information

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^title
response_param.desc: The product name of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_id
response_param.desc: The unique id of product sku which creator apply for as sample.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_image_url
response_param.desc: The URL of SKU image.

response_param.name: ^^^sku_name
response_param.desc: The description of sku

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.AffiliateSellerV202508API.AffiliateSeller202508SampleApplicationsSearchPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.PageToken("b2Zmc2V0PTAK")
    request = request.PageSize(50)
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody := affiliateSeller_v202508.NewAffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody()
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetProductId("123456")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetTitle("product name")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetCreatorUserOepnId("123456")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetUsername("test_tt_name")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetTargetCollabrationId("123456")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetOrderId("123456")
    affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody.SetStatus("PENDING")
    request = request.AffiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody(*affiliateSeller202508SellerSearchSampleApplicationsRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a Seller's overall TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration details (e.g., activity, applications, descriptions, and performance), creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, affiliate orders, and sample rules.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Collaborations, including but not limited to collaboration activity and performance, creator participation/engagement results, affiliate links, and affiliate orders.
